title: Supernova Alpha Release
content: Hi, is the Thunderbird Supernova Alpha available for download? If so, how do I download it?
creator: mike.pugh.is

title: Thunderbird not downloading emails when opting for saving password
content:
I recently updated my version of thunderbird to 115.0.1 after long time and I noticed that if I want to save the email accont's password, the connection with the server gets stuck after connecting to the Host, trying to send login information. If I leave the save checkbox empty, the download process of the emails runs without issues.

Is there a fix to this behaviour or do I need to keep entering the password every time I open Thunderbird?
creator: dani4le

title: Border of Excel portion when pasting on message body
content: When I am pasting a portion of Excel file on to the message body, i find that the border is missing after the message gets sent, though initially while writing the borders are visible. Can you suggest a solution? -- Thanks and Regards

title: Adding mail.com
content:
Hello, I am unable to add my mail.com address to my thunderbird. Does anyone have experience with it? it says incorrect password but I made sure the password is correct. Only issue is the login. I do not know what it is. https://i.imgur.com/BjJSDcf.png

Any tips would be appreciated.
creator: samokosik

title: Local folder size limit is no longer 4GB in 2023, right?
content:
In a lot of help articles related to Thunderbird, they still say the largest mailbox limit is 4GB. From what I understand this is no longer the case in modern version of Thunderbird (year 2023). But I can't find the current size limit -- is it only bound by the maximum file size limit set by the operating system (I am using Mac OS Ventura)?

I downloaded .mbox file from Google Takeout which is over 30GB. So far it opens fine when I put the .mbox file on a USB drive and open it in Thunderbird as Local Folder. I am wondering if I should leave it as is, using it as an email archive, or convert/split the .mbox file to avoid problems in the future?
creator: fw6z7xybc8

title: Thunderbird 102.13.0 64bit
content: Allow immediate notification of incoming email and Enable spell check as you type don't work. Have tried resetting, no joy. Started on Ubuntu 22.10 and continues on 23.04. I've seen this issue when one piece of data is stored in two places and they get out of sync. Unclear if that's the case here.
creator: rchristopherjohnson

title: Using 0auth2
content: I changed the password of one of my emails when trying to configure it for my phone. I forgot that it was set to 0auth2. So now I have changed the password and can open the Gmail, account online OK, but I can't find how to go back to the 0auth2 password. 0auth2 is still set in Thunderbird but I have no idea what the old 0auth2 code was. How can I update it to work again?
creator: addyjustforregistering

title: Invio posta elettronica
content:
Bungiorno, Al momento dell' invio di una Mail anche se questa parte regolarmente mi viene un avviso 'Non c'è spazio sufficiente per scaricare nuovi messaggi. Eliminare la vecchia posta e svuotare il cestino' Si rende noto che nella cartella Cestino non c' è nessuna mail visibile, e non ci sono le cartelle 'Posta inviata', 'Bozze'

Uso Windows WIN 11 PRO e per l' impostazioni uso POP

Allego Screenshot della videata che appare

Ringraziando per un eventuale risposta
creator: dario_gabrielli64

title: How to delete local copy of emails when my server is configured to IMAP?
content: I have limited capacity on my computer where Thunderbird is, and it ballooned up to 1.5GB on my computer. I would like to have a way to effectively remove all the download local emails without also removing them from my email provider (Yahoo), and also how to prevent it from doing that again. Thanks!
creator: kurt.zedriche

title: Always asks for password
content: I am using version 102.13.0 (64-bit) and there is no option to send both username and password. I am always asked for a password to get new messages. How do I fix this
creator: budman11
